title: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
cast: "James Marsden, Nick Nolte, Christina Applegate, Katt Williams, Bette Midler, Neil Patrick Harris, Sean Hayes, Wallace Shawn, Roger Moore, Joe Pantoliano, Michael Clarke Duncan, Chris O'Donnell, Jack McBrayer, Kiernan Shipka"
description: Cats and dogs must set aside their differences and merge animal instincts when Kitty Galore decides to claw her way to global domination

title: Babel
cast: "Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Gael García Bernal, Koji Yakusho, Adriana Barraza, Rinko Kikuchi, Said Tarchani, Boubker Ait El Caid, Elle Fanning, Nathan Gamble, Mohamed Akhzam"
description: "When an American couple vacationing in Morocco falls victim to a random act of violence, a series of events unfolds across four countries.

title: A Stoning in Fulham County
cast: "Ken Olin, Jill Eikenberry, Maureen Mueller, Gregg Henry, Nicholas Pryor, Noble Willingham, Peter Michael Goetz, Ron Perlman, Theodore Bikel, Olivia Burnette, Bill Allen, Brad Pitt"
description: "After reckless teens kill an Amish child, a prosecutor attempts to bring the youths to justice despite the condemnation he faces from the community.

title: 2307: Winter's Dream
cast: "Paul Sidhu, Arielle Holmes, Branden Coles, Kelcey Watson, Anne-Solenne Hatte, Brad Potts, Timothy Lee DePriest, Fernando Argosino, Duchess Dukes, Harwood Gordon, Stormi Henley"
description: "In the frozen tundra of a futuristic Arizona where humans have been forced underground, a soldier hunts the bioengineered leader of a rebellion.

title: Brad Paisley's Comedy Rodeo
cast: "Brad Paisley, Nate Bargatze, John Heffron, Jon Reep, Sarah Tiana, Mike E. Winfield"
description: "Country music star Brad Paisley hosts a night of music and laughs with comics Nate Bargatze, John Heffron, Jon Reep, Sarah Tiana and Mike E. Winfield.
